reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value but a bit of work.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because a friend of mine and i wanted to watch movies on the go. It has worked great. Things to note tho, you will need to spend a lot of time tinkering with your set up to get it just right. I have had this for about two months and used it once a week religously. This thing runs off a battery pack and is completly portable. You do have to be in a very dark place for the best quality picture but it works in a dimmly lit room as well. The built in speaker is ok if you are alone inside but if you intend on using this in a group setting or out side you will need a speaker and an aux chord. It does not excel at video playlists, even if the files are in alphabetical order it just wants to play random videos. All in all its a great product if you are willing to spend some time making it work for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars If I could give it zero stars...
reviews.reviewText: ... I would give it negative 5 if I could. It went back after trying it once. It's a nice looking projector and feels built well but the screen it projects is HORRIBLE. Worse yet the text on the screen is blurry making it hard to even figure out how to set the thing up. I bought an HDMI to USB C cable for my Galaxy Note 8 to project Netflix on to my wall. Didn't work at all. When I connected the cable to my phone some Samsung program called Dex showed up but the screen was so blurry I could not see what the directions were for use. I eventually figured out how to mirror my screen and started up Youtube to test it. It played at like 5 frames a second, stuttering and skipping terribly. Anyway, it's not at all worth the money and no matter what people tell you here you're not going to like it if you think you're going to watch a movie on it. Don't bother with this and just buy a real projector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Okay okay okay
reviews.reviewText: But what it is and what it cost it works great. So the light isn't so bright but what could I expect still can't plug a phone into it which is a shame overall it's excellent for what it is

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s still a good projector
reviews.reviewText: I like it but I will be buying a more high end one soon, I feel like it’ll work better for a kids room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s not loud
reviews.reviewText: I love it because it’s small

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 100% worth the price
reviews.reviewText: This thing is definitely worth the price. I was able to adjust the clarity & make it visible at many different distances. It fits in the hand & is extremely portable. The picture quality is acceptable, but not perfect. If you want perfect picture quality, you will need to pay a lot more for a projector. The sound is not very loud, would recommend hooking it up to a speaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I do not like this product! I bought it so I can use it outdoors and inside but the only thing it would connect to was YouTube. The reason I bought it was to watch Netflix and Hulu but not even that would work unless you buy another cable that was like $16. Even if I bought the cable I would only be able to watch YouTube :’( the screen quality sucks too, if you want it to look good you would have to put the screen up close to the wall. super sad and will definitely be returning and buying something better or just a tv 🙄

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WHERE DO I START??!?
reviews.reviewText: I think this product is very much worth the money !!!! However, there are a few things you need to know before buying this. You will need to purchase an HDMI cord ( along with a few other things ) if you don’t have them lying around your house. The sound on this machine is VERY quiet, so you’ll need to connect your own speakers as well. It’s a really cute product, it just takes a lot of set up if you’re planning a fun movie night !! It might be worth the $60-80 more to buy a higher end projector. But this is a great product overall !!
